home.title: Home
home.catchphrase: See bigger, have fun and be strategic!
home.introduction: Choose your color, your symbol and challenge your friends, or play against bots on grids from 3x3 to 8x8.

minimum.name: Minimum
minimum.legend: A {size} grid, a very good classic

maximum.name: Maximum
maximum.legend: An {size} grid to bring the whole world together

auto.name: System
auto.legend: Depending on your system or web browser configuration

about.title: About
about.introduction: Morpion 64 is the tic-tac-toe game ("morpion" in French), rethinked with a modern touch! Play on 3x3 to 8x8 grids and customize your experience with unique symbols and colors for each player.
about.svelte: Svelte is a framework for building incredibly concise web applications that do minimal work in the browser.
about.vite: Vite.js is a project build tool that provides a fast and easy build experience.
about.nodejs: Node.js is a working environment for the JavaScript programming language.
about.typescript: Typescript is an object-oriented programming language (based on Javascript) that offers more modern and robust features.

ranking.title: Ranking
ranking.confirm_reset_score: Do you really want to reset the scores?

profile.title: Profile

easy.name: Easy
easy.legend: The bot will use very little strategy

hard.name: Hard
hard.legend: The bot will use several techniques to win the game

medium.name: Medium
medium.legend: The bot will try to win but you can beat it

impossible.name: Impossible
impossible.legend: The bot will not give you any chance to win

peaceful.name: Peaceful
peaceful.legend: The bot will place itself randomly

profile.confirm_delete_profile: Do you really want to delete this profile ?
profile.confirm_reset_score: Do you really want to reset the score?
profile.legend_color_contrast: Adaptation of the symbol color according to the contrast (dark mode)
